行.definition: (bound form) to walk; to go; to travel; (literary) trip; journey; visit; (bound form) temporary; makeshift; (bound form) current; in circulation; (bound form) to do; to perform; capable; competent; all right; OK!; will do; behavior; conduct (Taiwan pr. [xing4]); (literary) about to; soon

行不從徑.definition: lit. not following the straight path (idiom); fig. looking for a shortcut to get ahead in work or study

行不改姓，坐不改名.pinyin: xíng bù gǎi xìng ， zuò bù gǎi míng
行不改姓，坐不改名.definition: see 行不更名，坐不改姓[xing2 bu4 geng1 ming2 , zuo4 bu4 gai3 xing4]

行不更名，坐不改姓.pinyin: xíng bù gēng míng ， zuò bù gǎi xìng
行不更名，坐不改姓.definition: I am who I am and not ashamed of it; to be proud of one's name and stand by one's actions

行不由徑.definition: lit. never taking a short-cut (idiom); fig. upright and honest

行不顧言.definition: to say one thing and do another (idiom)

行乞.definition: to beg; to ask for alms

行事.definition: to execute; to handle; behavior; action; conduct

行人.definition: pedestrian; traveler on foot; passer-by; official responsible for arranging audiences with the emperor

行令.definition: to issue orders; to order sb to drink in a drinking game

行兇.definition: violent crime; to commit a violent act (assault or murder)

行刑.definition: to carry out a (death) sentence; execution

行列.definition: formation; array; (fig.) ranks (as in "join the ranks of ...")

行動.definition: operation; action; CL:個|个[ge4]; to move about; mobile

行動不便.definition: unable to move freely; difficult to get about

行動值.definition: (gaming) action points (points required to complete an action); (Tw) action level (the level of concentration of a harmful substance at which remedial action is considered necessary)

行動劇.definition: (Tw) street theater (esp. as a form of political expression)

行員.definition: (Tw) staff; clerk; employee (of a bank 銀行|银行[yin2hang2] or commercial firm 商行[shang1hang2])

行唐.definition: Xingtang county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei

行唐縣.definition: Xingtang county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊|石家庄[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1], Hebei

行商.definition: traveling salesman; itinerant trader; hawker; peddler

行善.definition: to do good works; to be merciful

行好.definition: to be charitable; to do a good deed

行將.definition: ready to start on sth; about to act

行將就木.definition: to approach one's coffin (idiom); with one foot in the grave

行將結束.definition: approaching the end; about to conclude

行屍走肉.definition: walking corpse (idiom); zombie; person who lives only on the material level

行徑.definition: (usu. pejorative) conduct; behavior; act; path; trail

行情.definition: market price; quotation of market price; the current market situation

行房.definition: euphemism for sexual intercourse; to go to bed with sb

行拘.definition: to arrest without trial or charge (i.e. administrative detention) (abbr. for 行政拘留[xing2zheng4 ju1liu2]); (old) to arrest

行政區畫.definition: administrative subdivision (e.g. of provinces into counties)

行政單位.definition: administrative unit (e.g. province 省[sheng3], prefecture 地區|地区[di4 qu1] or county 縣|县[xian4])

行政拘留.definition: to incarcerate sb for a violation of administrative law, typically for 10 days or less; administrative detention

行政院.definition: Executive Yuan, the executive branch of government under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan

行文.definition: writing style (formal); to send an official written communication

行書.definition: running script; semicursive script (Chinese calligraphic style)

行會.definition: (HK) executive council (abbr. for 行政會議|行政会议[xing2zheng4 hui4yi4])

行有餘力.definition: after that, any remaining energy (idiom from Analects); time for extracurricular activities

行李箱.definition: suitcase; baggage compartment; overhead bin; (car) trunk; boot

行為準則.definition: code of conduct; standard of conduct

行狀.definition: (literary) brief obituary; one's past experience; one's past record; Taiwan pr. [xing4 zhuang4]

行百里者半九十.pinyin: xíng bǎi lǐ zhě bàn jiǔ shí
行百里者半九十.definition: lit. ninety li is merely a half of a hundred li journey (idiom); fig. the closer one is to completing a task, the tougher it gets; a task is not done until it's done

行禮.definition: to salute; to make one's salutations

行禮如儀.definition: to perform the ritual bows; to follow the customary ceremonies

行程.definition: journey; travel route; distance of travel; course (of history); stroke (of a piston); (Tw) (computing) process

行竊.definition: to steal; to commit a robbery

行船.definition: to sail a boat; to navigate

行萬里路勝讀萬捲書.pinyin: xíng wàn lǐ lù shèng dú wàn juǎn shū
行萬里路勝讀萬捲書.definition: to travel a thousand miles beats reading a thousand books

行號.definition: (computing) (text file) line number; (data table or spreadsheet) row number; (Tw) unincorporated firm (typically a smaller business such as a sole proprietorship or partnership)

行行出狀元.definition: lit. in every trade, a master appears (idiom); fig. You can produce outstanding achievements in any task, provided you put it enough love and diligence

行裝.definition: clothes and other items packed for traveling; baggage; luggage

行語.definition: slang; jargon; cant; lingo; patois; argot

行貨.definition: authorized goods; genuine goods; crudely-made goods

行車.definition: to drive a vehicle; movement of vehicles

行醫.definition: to practice medicine (esp. in private practice)

行雲流水.definition: lit. moving clouds and flowing water (idiom); fig. very natural and flowing style of calligraphy, writing, etc; natural and unforced

行頭.definition: a person's clothing; outfit; actor's costume

行駛.definition: to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
